description: A record number of Americans are now behind on their auto payments. descriptionSummary: As economic struggles mount, a record number of Americans are finding themselves unable to keep up with car loan payments. Stagnant wages and rising unemployment create a perfect storm for financial distress, further entrenching those already struggling to make ends meet.

title: Federal Tax Credits Have Ended - We're About To See The Real Market For EVs
description: On September 30, 2025, the federal tax credit for electrified vehicles ended.
